summary: Allows you to blcok and blockBash while dual wielding. As a bonus, you can also control which hand will attack will trigger.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]E7I4R1CiRF4[/youtube]

INFO
Lightweight mod. Allows you to Block & BlockBash while dualwielding. Also allows you to choose what arm your character will use (left/right) by moving while attacking: If you attack AND move to the right (or a combination of right and forward etc.) your character will use its LEFT arm to attack (else it will use its RIGHT arm). Theres also a random attack version now. No scripts just a few quick edits in 0_master.hkx in animations tab. Lastly, you can still perform dual weld power attacks from vanilla (press and hold block and attack) and dual swipe (tap attack and block at the same time.)

INSTALLATION
CHoose your favorite variation, download and load up the .esp file
Choices so far:
- Move Left, attack with right arm, move Right attack with left arm
- Random left/right arm attacks

ATTENTION:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67017/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D67017%26preview%3D&pUp=1] Highly recommended to use these behavior files along side this mod.
[/url]
If you find any bugs, please comment on it.
